New Records: Rohit Sharma went past 4000 runs in T20Is
Rohit Sharma hit his 599th and 600th sixes in international cricket
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 52 before retiring hurt
Rishabh Pant scored an unbeaten 36 off 26 balls
Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for 27 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 6 runs
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 35 runs
India won by 8 wickets with 46 balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: New York's pitch was inconsistent and difficult for batting
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant made short work of a target of 97
India's selection of four fast bowlers proved extremely useful
Batters from both teams took body blows due to the pitch conditions
